channel.title: Need Help Going about a code
channel.description:
Hi,
I don't know how to go about this code, I'm thinking of making it so someone on my server can talk to an NPC and buy a moderator's crown with 10m cash.
How would I go about doing this? With the chat and the crown implemation etc..
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Need Help Going about a code
item.dc:creator: @benscape benscape
item.description:
@benscape wrote:

Im not really sure how, tried googling it?

Read full topic
